subject: LinkedIn Professional Network: Security Review Required
body: Dear [User], Our automated security system has detected unusual changes to your LinkedIn network connections from a device in Amsterdam, Netherlands (IP: 82.XXX.XXX.XX). To protect your professional network and connections, please verify recent activities through our secure verification portal: security.linkedin.com/verify. Your account's visibility may be limited until verification is complete. Best regards, LinkedIn Trust & Safety Team
label: phishing

subject: Google Workspace Security Alert
body: Important: A new sign-in was detected on your Google Workspace account from Chrome Browser (Windows) in Singapore at 3:47 PM EST. Device details: Windows 10, Chrome 98.0.4758.102. If you don't recognize this activity, please review your recent account activity and security settings at workspace.google.com/security. For your protection, enable 2-step verification if not already active.
label: legit

subject: E-ZPass Notice: Outstanding Balance Review

To prevent registration suspension and additional fees, please review the detailed violation report and submit payment through our authorized payment processor: ezpass-payment.com/verify. Administrative fees will be added after July 24, 2025.
